title: Adult Self-Report Scale (ASRS) for ADHD
description: This test is a screening measure for ADHD. It is not a substitute for a professional diagnosis.

questions.text: 1. How often do you have trouble wrapping up the final details of a project once the challenging parts have been done?
2. How often do you have difficulty getting things in order when you have to do a task that requires organization?

scoringBands.label: Low likelihood
scoringBands.message: Your score suggests fewer symptoms commonly associated with ADHD.

scoringBands.label: Moderate likelihood
scoringBands.message: Your score suggests some symptoms that may be associated with ADHD.

scoringBands.label: High likelihood
scoringBands.message: Your score suggests a strong indication of ADHD symptoms. Consider seeking professional help.
